metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Customer Experience Coordinator, you help set the tone and ensure delivery of our Radically Personal customer journey. Consider yourself the store’s lead ambassador of the brand and point of reference for the customer. You support all activities necessary for the efficient operation of the store experience and provide exemplary service to maximize sales, promote the Company’s image of quality and professionalism. A Customer Experience Coordinator performs duties, in partnership with their management team, with the specific focus of shaping the store experience.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: Suitsupply is always pushing the boundaries of customer service, aiming to deliver the highest standards of care to our customers globally. We are hiring a Customer Service Specialist for our international, social, sales-driven, and dynamic Customer Service team. If you have a keen interest in fashion and have a fresh perspective on customer service, we’d love to hear from you!

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: Reporting to the Regional Customer Operations Manager, you’ll lead by example: actively handling customer cases while leading a team of senior and junior agents. Your role balances daily operations, coaching, and performance management, with a strong emphasis on empowering your team, fostering trust, and nurturing a supportive environment that drives collective success.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: The Engineering Manager steers multiple teams within the same domain (i.e. an Engineering Manager for ecommerce, steering the ecommerce teams). He/She is an agile leader, the team is responsible for its own success. If the team is not delivering, then the Engineering Manager should step in and make sure they are delivering.

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: The Executive Assistant will be covering a 9-month maternity leave. This is a dynamic and exciting role providing opportunity to grow beyond the standard EA / PA responsibilities.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: You will be the right hand to the C.O.O. managing their daily agenda, email, admin and travel.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: You will also be required to assist with more complex tasks such as gathering and analysing information from cross-functional teams, assisting to prepare overviews and PowerPoint presentations for key meetings and arranging complicated travel for larger groups.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: The Executive Assistant is a dynamic and exciting role providing opportunity to grow beyond the standard EA / PA responsibilities. You will be the right hand to the C.O.O. managing their daily agenda, email, admin and travel. You will also be required to assist with more complex tasks such as gathering and analysing information from cross-functional teams, assisting to prepare overviews and PowerPoint presentations for key meetings and arranging complicated travel for larger groups.

location.name: New York, New York, United States

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: Responsible for overseeing the maintenance, repairs, safety, and operational efficiency of all retail and corporate locations.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: Ensures that all facilities meet brand standards, optimizing functionality while managing maintenance, refits, vendor relationships, and budget allocation.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: This position requires a hands-on, solution-driven mindset to maintain Suitsupply’s high standards.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: The Facilities Director is responsible for overseeing the maintenance, repairs, safety, and operational efficiency of all retail and corporate locations. This role ensures that all facilities meet brand standards, optimizing functionality while managing maintenance, refits, vendor relationships, and budget allocation. This position requires a hands-on, solution-driven mindset to maintain Suitsupply’s high standards.

location.name: New York, New York, United States

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: As a Facilities Manager, you are responsible for overseeing the maintenance, repairs, safety, and day-to-day operational efficiency of a regional group of retail locations.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: You ensure every facility meets brand standards by optimizing functionality and managing both preventative and reactive maintenance, vendor relationships, inventory, and capital improvement projects.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: You bring a hands-on, solution-driven mindset along with strong project management skills to keep budgets, schedules, and coordination on track with internal teams and external partners.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Facilities Manager, you are responsible for overseeing the maintenance, repairs, safety, and day-to-day operational efficiency of a regional group of retail locations. You ensure every facility meets brand standards by optimizing functionality and managing both preventative and reactive maintenance, vendor relationships, inventory, and capital improvement projects. You bring a hands-on, solution-driven mindset along with strong project management skills to keep budgets, schedules, and coordination on track with internal teams and external partners.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: In order to improve and scale Custom Made application and add Made to Measure. A string strong Front-end developer is needed, able to deliver the vision of the Product using existing and new technologies to ensure the superior Customer Experience.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: The Head of VM is responsible for developing and driving the global visual merchandising strategy, ensuring a consistent and impactful brand experience across all regions and store formats. the Head of VM manages a team of regional VM Managers, and collaborates closely with key cross-functional partners (Styling, Merchandising, Allocation, Retail Managers, and Retail Operations). This role requires an exceptional blend of creativity, commercial acumen, and operational expertise, with a strong understanding of menswear and global retail dynamics.

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: Our approach to men's fashion is strongly setting us apart from the establishment and is creating new space with tailoring at its core

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: People who don't just want to fit in but want to find their own way and their own perfect fit.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: Professionals with a pioneering spirit who are straight to the point, effective and have a strong sense of aesthetic & flair.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: We are looking for a Junior Buyer to work within our Ready to Wear Production Team. Our approach to men's fashion is strongly setting us apart from the establishment and is creating new space with tailoring at its core. We are there for people who want to be seen. People who don't just want to fit in but want to find their own way and their own perfect fit. Professionals with a pioneering spirit who are straight to the point, effective and have a strong sense of aesthetic & flair.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Merchandise Planner at Suitsupply, you'll be ensuring the right products are available at the right time to meet customer demands. You'll dive into sales data, forecasting future trends, and crafting strategies to optimize inventory levels while balancing sales and profitability. Collaborating closely with various teams, you'll contribute in shaping our global business and influence our rapid growth. In this role you'll be partnering with Merchandising, Production, Allocation teams.

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: As a Senior Paid Social Specialist, you will develop and execute the advertising strategy for our paid social channels in EMEA and US.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: Lead the collaboration with our creative team, including briefing them for assets.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: Develop and lead the paid social strategy across Meta, Pinterest, TikTok, and other platforms

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Senior Paid Social Specialist, you will develop and execute the advertising strategy for our paid social channels in EMEA and US. And lead the collaboration with our creative team, including briefing them for assets.

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: you will deliver the analysis, insights, and recommendations that will drive discussion and decision on the most important questions in the business.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: You’ll dive into data, structure ambiguous problems, and translate findings into clear findings that influence the strategic direction of Suitsupply.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: the Strategy & Planning (S&P) team partners with the CEO, COO and senior leadership team to shape the company’s growth agenda. We combine rigorous analytics with operational excellence to ensure there is progress on the company’s top priorities.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Senior Strategy Associate, you will deliver the analysis, insights, and recommendations that will drive discussion and decision on the most important questions in the business. You’ll dive into data, structure ambiguous problems, and translate findings into clear findings that influence the strategic direction of Suitsupply.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: We are looking for a new Senior Production Manager to work within our Ready To Wear Production Team. Our approach to men's fashion is strongly setting us apart from the establishment and is creating new space with tailoring at its core. We are there for people who want to be seen. People who don't just want to fit in, but want to find their own way and their own perfect fit. Professionals with a pioneering spirit who are straight to the point, effective and have a strong sense of aesthetic & flair.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: Raise the bar on our code base

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: If you’re a proactive, problem-solving team player who likes to take ownership of your work, this could be the job for you. As a senior member, you not only bring an abundance of expertise to your team, but you also know how to inspire, uplift and bring out the best in your colleagues. Always striving for continuous improvement, you adapt to change easily and are always eager to learn. In a flat organization like Suitsupply, there are ample opportunities to broaden your horizons by moving between different teams, and strengthen your skill set within the wider organization. Suitsupply is growing in every aspect IT-wise, and therefore, we're looking for Senior Software Engineers to join us on the journey of becoming the global tailoring expert.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Stock Supervisor, you will work in partnership with the leadership team to ensure optimal preparedness for the customer experience. You will be responsible for receiving deliveries, organizing stock and identifying areas of opportunity for the store operations and allocation teams. As a Stock Supervisor, you have a close attention to detail, are tech savvy, with exceptional time management and organizational skills.

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: Craftsmanship at Its Core.  Work with premium fabrics and world-class tailoring standards.  Hone your skills in a company rooted in precision, fit, and personal service.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: Radically Personal Service.  Bring each client’s vision to life through expert alterations and customizations.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: Blend traditional hand-finishing with contemporary tailoring innovations

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value:
You said:
Job USPs for tailors
ChatGPT said:
Here’s a concise list of Job USPs (Unique Selling Points) you can use to highlight the Tailor role — tailored (pun intended) for Suitsupply’s tone and employer branding:

✂️ Tailor – Job USPs
1. Craftsmanship at Its Core

Work with premium fabrics and world-class tailoring standards.

Hone your skills in a company rooted in precision, fit, and personal service.

2. Radically Personal Service

Bring each client’s vision to life through expert alterations and customizations.

Be part of a team that turns fittings into memorable experiences.

3. Modern Tools, Timeless Techniques

Access industry-leading equipment in a modern atelier environment.

Blend traditional hand-finishing with contemporary tailoring innovations.

4. Growth and Mastery

Continuous training to perfect your technique and expand your craftsmanship.

Clear development path toward Senior Tailor, Master Tailor, or Studio Lead roles.

5. Global Brand, Local Pride

Join an international company with a strong reputation for quality and fit.

Work alongside a diverse, passionate team that values style and detail.

6. Style Meets Function

Contribute directly to the final product that defines Suitsupply’s reputation.

Enjoy the satisfaction of seeing your work worn by clients every day.

7. Environment That Inspires

Clean, well-equipped tailoring studios located inside our stores.

A culture that celebrates craftsmanship, collaboration, and individuality.

Would you like me to adapt these for a job posting format (e.g., “What You Will Do / Who You Are / What You’ll Get”) or keep them as standalone USPs for an internal campaign or presentation?

You said:
tailor short description 3-4 sentences
ChatGPT said:
A Tailor at Suitsupply brings craftsmanship and precision to every garment, ensuring the perfect fit and finish for each client. Working with premium fabrics and modern tools, you’ll deliver expert alterations and personalized touches that define our radically personal service. In this role, you’ll blend timeless tailoring techniques with contemporary style, creating a look and experience that’s uniquely Suitsupply.
